protagonist.name: John Doe
protagonist.description: A brave and adventurous soul, struggling to find his place in the world.
protagonist.motivations: To protect his loved ones and find inner peace.
protagonist.fears: Failing those who depend on him.

antagonist.name: Jane Smith
antagonist.description: Cunning and manipulative, always seeking power and control.
antagonist.motivations: To ascend to ultimate power at any cost.

supporting.name: Sam Taylor
supporting.description: Loyal and amiable with a knack for bringing people together.
supporting.motivations: To support friends and maintain harmony.
supporting.fears: Conflict and chaos among loved ones.
